positive: centered, three-quarters view, full body visible. Lighting: Flat studio lighting, high-key illumination, zero harsh shadows, uniform brightness, no lens flare, neutral white balance. Camera: Orthographic-like perspective, 85mm lens, deep depth of field, every part of the object in sharp focus, no motion blur. Technical: High-fidelity geometry, physically based textures, anti-aliased edges, 8k resolution, raw photo style, isolated on a solid #808080 gray background.
negative: depth of field, bokeh, blurred background, drop shadows, contact shadows, reflections on the floor, bloom, glow, vignetting, wide-angle distortion, fish-eye, low-poly, text, watermarks, overlapping objects
